questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
A company is migrating to Microsoft 365.
The company is evaluating collaboration integrations in Microsoft Teams.
You need to recommend the Microsoft Power Platform integration that provides the appropriate feature.
Which integrations should you recommend? To answer, drag the appropriate integrations to the correct features. Each integration may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
This was in the exam on 3rd April 23
Answer is Y, Y, N

To install Microsoft 365 Defender for Endpoint on Windows 10 devices, you need to deploy the Microsoft Defender for Endpoint onboarding package 1. This package includes the Microsoft Defender for Endpoint client, which is installed on the endpoints you want to protect 1. Once the client is installed, it will start sending data to the Microsoft Defender for Endpoint service, which will provide you with insights into the security posture of your organization 1.

Therefore, it is not true that Microsoft 365 Defender for Endpoint requires a separate installation for Windows 10 devices. Instead, you need to deploy the onboarding package to install the client on your Windows 10 devices 
so it is YES YES NO
The Answer is Y, Y, N
Third one is probably wrong. Defender comes pre-installed on windows 10 systems.

comments.content: That just shows how to onboard a Windows 10 device to manage Defender remotely, the Defender client is part of windows 10, it doesn't need installing separately, I think the third one is wrong

discussion.content:
third one is correct as its not preinstalled
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/defender-endpoint/onboard-windows-client?view=o365-worldwide

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT -
A company is evaluating threat protection in Microsoft 365.
Instructions: For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

Your company has a Microsoft Office 365 subscription.
As an administrator for this subscription, you are required to configure the use of a cloud security feature that allows for emails and documents to be classified and labeled.
Which of the following is the feature you should use?

choices.C: Microsoft Azure AD Privilege Identity Protection.

discussion.content:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/information-protection/what-is-information-protection

A is right
This question is no longer relevant in the exam

Selected Answer: A
The correct answer is:

A. Microsoft Azure Information Protection

Explanation:
To classify and label emails and documents in Microsoft Office 365, you should use Microsoft Azure Information Protection (AIP). AIP is a cloud-based solution that allows you to classify, label, and protect sensitive information by applying labels to emails and documents. These labels can enforce protection policies, such as encryption and access restrictions, based on the sensitivity of the data.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/information-protection/what-is-information-protection

O recurso que você deve usar para configurar a classificação e a rotulagem de e-mails e documentos na nuvem é a "Proteção de Informações do Microsoft Azure" (opção A). A Proteção de Informações do Microsoft Azure permite classificar e rotular os dados com base em políticas de segurança e ajuda a proteger informações confidenciais, tanto nos e-mails quanto nos documentos, aplicando rótulos de proteção e políticas de segurança.

Selected Answer: D
The answer is D.

comments.content: Why? Intune App Protection does not allow classification and labeling. Should be answer A

discussion.content:
A is correct imo
The rest of the awnsers are about identity

Azure Information Protection analytics pages in the Azure portal have been deprecated and are no longer available. Instead, we highly recommend that you use the Microsoft Purview compliance portal's activity explorer and M365 unified audit log, which provide comprehensive logging and reporting.
A is the correct answer while rest is about identity.

This should be Microsoft Purview, the options are out of date. 
here is the link : https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/information-protection?view=o365-worldwide
Hasn't this been changed to Purview?

Selected Answer: A
A is right

Correct.
Identity Protection is automated AI technology to protect user accounts from anomalies.
Privileged identity protection is for dynamic role-based for Administrators to work with limited access to prevent inside organization risks.
